name: booklogr
tagline: A lightweight reading tracker for logging books, ratings, and progress
description: Booklogr is a lightweight reading tracker app that helps users log the books they read, rate them, and track progress. Its clean web interface makes it accessible across devices, and it's easy to self-host.

features.title: Reading Tracker
features.description: Log books you've read with detailed information. Complete reading history

features.title: Rating System
features.description: Rate and review books you've finished. Share your opinions

features.title: Progress Tracking
features.description: Monitor reading progress for current books. Stay motivated

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Simple, focused web UI for easy use. Distraction-free

features.title: Cross
features.description: Access your reading log from any device. Read anywhere

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep reading data private on your server. Complete privacy

features.title: Easy Setup
features.description: Quick deployment with minimal configuration. Start tracking quickly
